tool_description: Select a voice & call the convert endpoint! Multiple languages and voices available. Real examples in the ReadMe section.
title: Text to Speech (multiple languages & voices)

api_list.name: Convert - Studio Type Voice
api_list.description: Convert text to speech using a voice of type "Studio"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-multiple-languages-voices1.p.rapidapi.com/voice_type/Studio/convert"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-multiple-languages-voices1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List voices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-multiple-languages-voices1.p.rapidapi.com/voice"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-multiple-languages-voices1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
